entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:38 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 01:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain and ice pellets early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
